scripts.dev2: NODE_ENV=development concurrently -c blue,cyan,magenta "webpack --watch --config webpack.config.server.js" "sleep 3 && nodemon --watch build/server build/server/bundle.js" "webpack-dev-server -d --hot --inline --no-info --port 3020 --config webpack.config.js"
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development concurrently -c blue,cyan,magenta "webpack --watch --config webpack.config.server.js" "sleep 3 && nodemon --watch build/server build/server/bundle.js" "webpack-dev-server --devtool eval --progress --colors --hot --content-base build"
scripts.devbg &: NODE_ENV=development concurrently -c blue,cyan,magenta "webpack --watch --config webpack.config.server.js" "sleep 3 && nodemon --watch build/server build/server/bundle.js" "webpack-dev-server --devtool eval --progress --colors --hot --content-base build"
